title: No Wings Attached
description: Approximately 270 pages.Life couldn't get any worse for 32-year-old single again and working in two jobs she hates; the last thing she needs is falling for gorgeous, out-of-her-league, arrogant Tom.Being a wish-consultant, Tom has to make up for a failed case and is sent to make her wishes come true without his usual skills. Not easy when she's reluctant to talk to him. In order to help her become happy, he needs to win her trust and unexpectedly develops feelings he shouldn't have.When finally everything seems to fall into place for Celia, she receives a phone call that turns her world upside down once again.
author: Stella Deleuze
